articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Machine-Building Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Machine-Building Plant
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Kwanmobong Machine-Building Plant which successfully put its production processes on a CNC basis.
					 Being briefed on the plant before a large map showing its panoramic view, he went round the outside and inside of the technologically updated plant for hours to acquaint himself in detail with its technological updating and production.
					
					 Watching CNC-based machine tools standing in rows in every worksite and products being churned out from them in an endless stream, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the plant have made rapid progress in the manufacture of mechanical products by successfully putting the production processes on a modern and scientific basis and highly appreciated their feats.
					
					 The officials, workers and technicians of the plant could turn the plant into one as required by the age of knowledge-based economy by waging a dynamic mass technical innovation movement, he noted, highly appreciating such revolutionary work style and enterprising working attitude as bringing about uninterrupted advances and innovations without a moment's stagnation and marking time. 
					
					 Noting that the plant set an example not only in the modernization but also in the cultured practices in production and life, he repeatedly estimated a lot of work done by the officials and workers of the plant to spruce its inside as a palace and outside as a park.
					
					 He set forth highly important tasks that would serve as guidelines for the management of the plant and production there.
					
					 Underscoring the need for the plant to keep dashing ahead to attain a higher scientific and technological goal on the basis of the successes made in putting it on a CNC basis, he set the goals to be attained by the plant in the near future and specified the orientation and ways to do so.
					
					 He said that the most important task facing the plant is to wage a dynamic drive to rapidly increase the manufacture of new products.
					
					 He gave a warm pep talk to workers at the production site, encouraging them in their devoted efforts to make the country rich and prosperous.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the officials and workers of the plant would as ever creditably play their role as vanguard and a shock brigade in implementing the WPK's economic policy.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek and First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang of the WPK Central Committee and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits Construction Sites of Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits Construction Sites of Power Station
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Orangchon Power Station under construction and the Chongjin Rabbit Breeding Stock Farm.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the construction sites of the Orangchon Power Station.
					
					 After being briefed on the power station before a huge map showing its panoramic view, he looked round various places of the construction sites to acquaint himself in detail with the progress made in the construction.
					
					 Saying it is very good that officials, workers and technicians have advanced the project three years ahead of schedule while saving a lot of materials, he appreciated their creative and innovative work style.
					
					 Orangchon Power Station No. 2 is located in a good place and was designed well strictly on the principle of profitability as is the case with Power Station No. 1, he noted, praising the constructors for creating a precious asset conducive to the building of a rich and powerful country and encouraging them in their labor drive. 
					
					 He said that if power stations are built at different levels in the days ahead under a long-term design of the power station, it is possible to make a comprehensive use of the water of the River Orang for generating a large volume of electricity and turning the landscape of the area more beautiful. 
					
					 Making the round of the construction site of the Phalhyang Dam of the power station, he was greatly pleased to see the dam construction making rapid progress. He extended a warm salute to all the builders.
					
					 He advanced important tasks that would serve as guidelines for completing the construction of the power station earlier than scheduled, and showed such great loving care as personally unraveling the knotty problems on the spot.
					
					 It is economical to build hydro-power stations in the natural and geographical environment of the country which abounds in rivers and streams, and to do so provides the shortest cut to satisfactorily meeting the ever-growing demand for electricity, he said, underscoring the need to continue thoroughly implementing the Party's policy for building minor hydro-power stations in a big way while constructing large ones.
					
					 He called for building more new power stations by tapping all hydro-resources while giving fullest play to the capacities of the existing power stations. 
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Chongjin Rabbit Breeding Stock Farm.
					
					 He went round rabbit coops and veterinary treatment rooms and various other places of the farm to learn in detail about its technical equipment and production.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the province successfully built the breeding stock farm, rapidly increasing the production of leverets and supplying large quantities of duck to the people by raising rabbits and ducks simultaneously.
					
					 He underscored the need to actively encourage the rabbit breeding as rabbits are domestic animals which ensure not only high productivity but great economic profitability because it is easy to raise them wherever there is grass and indicated ways to massively breed rabbits.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the arrowroot mountain behind the village and grass land on the field in front of it, he said that if rabbits are raised the way this breeding stock farm does, it is possible to thoroughly implement the Party's policy on breeding grass-eating animals in a big way to enable the Korean people to have rich diet. He called on all units to follow its example.
					
					 It is possible to raise a lot of grass-eating animals including goats and rabbits in every part of the country with many mountains, he said, underlining the need to more dynamically conduct this work as a mass movement so as to bring about a great leap forward in turning out livestock products.
					
					 He learned about economic affairs in North Hamgyong Province and set forth tasks to be fulfilled by it to place them on a new higher level. 
					
					 Saying that the province has an important role to play for the nation's economic development, he called on it to play a vanguard role in building an economic power.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek and First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang of the WPK Central Committee and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Ryongsong Machine Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Ryongsong Machine Complex
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					 After being briefed on the complex before a large map showing its panoramic view, he went round for a long while the inside of the new casting shop to acquaint himself in detail with its construction and technical equipment.
					
					 Watching the streamlined production processes equipped with cutting-edge technology and work sites kept neat and tidy, he expressed great satisfaction with the successful construction of the modern casting shop.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the officials, workers and technicians of the complex, saying it is a signal success, indeed, for them to have built a casting shop by their own efforts as required by the IT age, bringing about a new change in the casting revolution. 
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the shop, noting that the casting shop of the Ryongsong Machine Complex has an important role to play in the production of castings on the east coast.
					
					 Such basic processes as steel casting, molding and forging are important for modernizing the complex and boosting the production of machines, he said, underlining the need to steadily increase the role of the shop equipped with latest facilities.
					
					 He noted that in order to keep the production of castings going at a high rate and improve the quality of products, it is necessary to intensify the technological education of the technicians and workers. 
					
					 He then made the rounds of various places including Machine Shop No. 4 to acquaint himself with the production of custom-built equipment.
					
					 Learning in detail about the mechanism, performance and operation principle of lots of various type modern large machines and equipment including a 90,000 cubic meter centrifugal compressor standing in rows in the shop, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the complex made splendid creations greatly conducive to the prosperity of the country.  
					
					 Strongly backed by hosts of powerful machine plants such as the Ryongsong Machine Complex, we could successfully realize the socialist industrialization in such a brief span of time and rapidly augment the nation's economic potential, he said, adding that this strikingly demonstrates the validity and tremendous vitality of the WPK's original economic line on simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture, while giving priority to the development of the heavy industry with the machine-building industry as its core. 
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the complex.
					
					 He underlined the need to energetically accelerate the modernization and scientization of the complex and widely introduce advanced technology in order to put the machine-building industry on a new high stage as required by the new century. 
					
					 He had a photo session with labor innovators of the complex.
					
					 After touring Hamhung City, he examined a miniature of the city construction layout plan and other plans for the development of major economic fields in South Hamgyong Province and guided the work in this domain on the spot. 
					
					 Underscoring the need to build Hamhung City under a long-term plan by thoroughly applying the socialist principle, the principle of popular character as it is the industrial city with a large number of workers, he specified the orientation and ways to do so. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek and First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang of the WPK Central Committee and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: National Defence Commission Issues Statement
articles.content:
National Defence Commission Issues Statement
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission issued a statement today as regards the sinking of warship "Cheonan" of the south Korean puppet navy.
					The statement reads:
					
					We had already warned the south Korean group of traitors not to make reckless remarks concerning the sinking of warship "Cheonan" of the puppet navy.
					
					Nevertheless, the group of traitors had far-fetchedly tried to link the case with us without offering any material evidence. It finally announced the results of the joint investigation based on a sheer fabrication, which assert that the warship was sunken by our torpedo attack, in a bid to mislead the public opinion inside and outside Korea.
					
					It is, at the same time, crying out for "punishment" and "retaliation" internally and foolishly seeking to prod the international community into applying additional "sanctions" against the DPRK. 
					
					What matters is that traitor Lee Myung Bak is taking the lead in such anti-DPRK smear campaign, even daring slander the headquarters of our revolution.
					
					Meanwhile, Kim Thae Yong and other gangsters of the south Korean puppet military accustomed to flattery and blind obedience echo Lee Myung Bak's outbursts. This smear campaign is fanned up by Ryu Myung Hwan and other ultra-rightist conservatives of south Korea. 
					
					This is also joined by the U.S. and Japanese aggressors who are making desperate efforts to keep their hostile policy towards the DPRK on its orbit.
					
					We would like to question them so busy linking the above-said case with the DPRK why they don't link with it the death of a puppet army soldier, crashes of fighter plane and gunship of the puppet navy and air force and the sinking of a civilian fishing boat that occurred one after another almost simultaneously.
					
					It is the age of science and technology.
					
					As a swollen balloon is bound to break, any lie is bound to be brought to light no matter how hard one may try to make it sound plausible.
					
					What is evident is that the sinking of warship "Cheonan" can never be construed otherwise than a "conspiratorial farce" and "charade" orchestrated by the group of traitors in a deliberate and brigandish manner to achieve certain political and military aims because only 46 soldiers met miserable deaths while officers survived the case. 
					
					This being a hard reality, they are pointing a dirty accusing finger at us like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					It is a trite method of the successive south Korean puppet regimes to fake up a shocking case and use it for floating a story about "north wind" whenever they find themselves in a crisis. 
					
					These days they are using for this plot even "deserters from the north" who had found their ways to a dumping ground and human scum. 
					
					The National Defence Commission of the DPRK responsible for the defence of the country and the security of the nation clarifies the principled stand of our army and people in view of the grave situation where the sinister plot of the group of traitors may lead to reckless actions against us.
					
					1. As the group of traitors declared that the sinking of the warship
					
					"Cheonan" is linked with us, the NDC of the DPRK will dispatch
					
					an inspection group to the spot of south Korea to verify material
					
					evidence concerning the linkage. 
					
					The group of traitors should produce before the dignified
					
					inspection group of the DPRK material evidence proving that the
					
					sinking of the warship is linked with us. 
					
					We remind the group of traitors in advance that there should be
					
					not a shred of doubt about the material evidence to be produced
					
					before the inspection group. 
					
					2. Our army and people will promptly react to any "punishment" and "retaliation" and to any "sanctions" infringing upon our state interests with various forms of tough measures including an all-out war. 
					
					The all-out war to be undertaken by us will be a sacred war involving the whole nation, all the people and the whole state for completely eliminating the strongholds of the group of traitors who orchestrated "the conspiratorial farce" and "charade" and their followers and building instead a reunified power in which the whole nation emerges powerful and prosperous. 
					
					The tough countermeasures to be taken by us will prove to be practical actions of justice for dealing unpredictable sledge-hammer blows at the group of traitors who blocks national reconciliation and unity and stirs up an atmosphere of confrontation in the south Korean society. 
					
					3. Now that the group of traitors declared what it called "decisive actions", we will brand any small incident that occurs in the territorial waters, air and land where our sovereignty is exercised including the West Sea of Korea as a provocation of confrontation maniacs and react to it with unlimited retaliatory blow, merciless strong physical blow. 
					
					It is our invariable iron will to react to "retaliation" with more powerful retaliation and to "punishment" with indiscriminate punishment of our style. 
					
					Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we sternly warn the U.S. and Japanese authorities and riff-raffs, their poor lackeys, to act with discretion. 
					
					The world will clearly see what dear price the group of traitors will have to pay for the clumsy "conspiratorial farce" and "charade" concocted to stifle compatriots.

articles.title: DPRK Youth League Delegation Leaves for Iran
articles.content:
DPRK Youth League Delegation Leaves for Iran
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League headed by Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of its Central Committee, left here Thursday to visit Iran.

articles.title: Korean and Chinese Schools Friendly Meeting
articles.content:
Korean and Chinese Schools Friendly Meeting
 Pyongyang May 20 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting took place at Changdok School here on Thursday to mark the 50th anniversary of the establishment of friendly relations between Changdok School and the Jilin Yuwen Middle School of China.
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the friendship delegation of the Jilin Yuwen Middle School headed by Principal He Manli and Li Qingjiang, councilor of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Teachers and students of Changdok School including its Principal Kang Jun Ho were on hand.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, the members of the delegation laid a basket of flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the school to pay respects to him.
					
					 Then they looked round historic relics with keen interest, being briefed on the fact that Kim Il Sung grasped the truth of the revolution while experiencing the miserable reality of the country under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists in the days when he was studying at Changdok School.
					
					 They also visited several educational facilities of the school.
					
					 The participants in the meeting shared their view on boosting the relations between the two schools associated with the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and watched an art performance of students, deepening friendship.

articles.title: Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm Sharply Enlarged
articles.content:
Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm Sharply Enlarged
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A project for expanding the capacity of the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm has made brisk headway since the end of last year. As a result, the area of the fruit farm has more than quadrupled in a matter of a few months and at least 1.8 million short apple trees of high-yielding species struck their roots in the right spring time.
					 The soldier-builders did a great deal of work in a three-dimensional way. Land was realigned, river and stream improvement projects carried out, a total of nearly 1,700km of trench-like ditches dug, hundreds of thousands of concrete props produced and set up and dozens of kilometers of fences erected. 
					
					 Thanks to their popular heroism and devoted efforts, such major projects as cutting more than 6 million cubic meters of earth and laying it on the ground, digging ditches for fruit trees and applying manure were completed in the main by March, thereby opening up a bright prospect for creating hundreds of hectares of fruit orchards in the right time.
					
					 Pyongyangites including officials of ministries and national institutions helped the soldier-builders in their work. They applied more than a hundred tons of manure per hectare to the fields, increasing the fertility of soil in the orchards. 
					
					 The orchards have been tended like a flower garden and the planting of fruit trees based on close-planting and cultivation technology of Korean style was carried out in a big way in the spring tree planting season. 
					
					 The recently enlarged orchards have been built on the highest level under a long-term plan to put all requirements for fruit production such as the work to raise the soil fertility, distribution of fruit trees and irrigation system and the operation and management of the farm on a scientific, intensive and modern basis.
					
					 All young orchards on this farm are now covered with apple flowers, making the area of Wonhung fragrant with sweet smell of flowers in the height of this spring season.

articles.title: Korean Art Gallery Reconstructed
articles.content:
Korean Art Gallery Reconstructed
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean Art Gallery has been reconstructed in a modern style.
					 Thousands of square meters of corridors and halls of the building were floored with high-quality granite and their walls decorated with stone tiles. 
					
					 Ceilings, pillars, handrails and other parts of the interior were renewed to produce decorative and artistic effects to the maximum.
					
					 Wide halls and long corridors have been replenished with art works of various genres, including essays of renowned artists, so that visitors can enjoy art works in different parts of the gallery.
					
					 The show rooms have also taken on a new look.
					
					 They are 20 centimeters lower than before. Carved walls and ceilings, soft-colored and pacific-patterned floors and up-to-date illustrators add artistic value to the exhibits.
					
					 The gallery, a mixture of modern and national architecture, houses art works as valuable as national assets.

articles.title: Modernization of Light Industry Factories Moves Ahead
articles.content:
Modernization of Light Industry Factories Moves Ahead
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The modernization of production processes is making good headway at light industry factories throughout the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Pyongyang Textile Mill is building a production base of spun rayon fabrics and the Pyongyang Textile Machine Plant is reconditioning its equipment.
					
					 The Pyongyang Footwear Machine Factory has manufactured effective shoemaking lines to increase the output at footwear factories.
					
					 The Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory is buckling down to boosting  the toothbrush production, while the Hamhung Disabled Soldiers' Plastic Daily Necessities Factory is pushing ahead with the construction of an injection-molded shoes production process at the final stage to meet women's growing demand for them.
					
					 Similar news has come from foodstuff factories, too.
					
					 The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory has introduced CNC technology in its production processes by and large and the Pyongyang Flour-processing Combine has finished technical preparations in a short span of time to streamline the bread, flour, yeast and noodle production processes.
					
					 Foodstuff factories in local areas have also undergone technical remodeling of packing and other processes, while raising the production of specialties.
					
					 Researchers from Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and other universities and scientists from the State Academy of Sciences have rendered assistance to the factories in their technical updating.

articles.title: Poems of Kim Jong Il's China Visit Created
articles.content:
Poems of Kim Jong Il's China Visit Created
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Poems were created in the DPRK in congratulation of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's successful visit to China. 
					 Lyrics titled "A Path Traveled with President Kim Il Sung" and "The Northeastern Fields and Mountains" impressively represent the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man who left sacred footprints on the vast Chinese land true to the noble intention of Kim Il Sung who provided the tradition of the DPRK-China friendship. 
					
					 Poems titled "Our General, the Great Man of the Century", "Though He Visited Quietly", etc. make poetic depiction of the energetic foreign activities conducted by Kim Jong Il, highly praising him as the sun of Songun and the peerlessly great man revered by all people.
					
					 There are also poems representing the iron will of the army and people of the DPRK to glorify
						 Kim Jong Il's feats with achievements in building a thriving nation and the feelings of the Korean people eagerly longing for him who continues his field guidance without taking a rest after the long journey of visit.

articles.title: S. Korea's Groundless Accusations against DPRK Refuted
articles.content:
S. Korea's Groundless Accusations against DPRK Refuted
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group at the NPT review conference now under way in the U.S. behaved so recklessly as imploring for "more tightened international sanctions" against the DPRK, while making groundless accusations against it with a hue and cry over "a blatant challenge to nuclear non-proliferation." At the 25th south Korea-U.S. "meeting on security policy initiative" the group was so foolish as to beg its master for "military cooperation" in the moves against the DPRK while vociferating about what it called "provocation" and "threat".
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The puppet group's above-said behavior is nothing but a treacherous criminal act to do harm to the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces under the pretext of "nuclear non-proliferation".
					
					 This betrays the despicable ambition of the group of traitors to stand in the way of the process for building a peace-keeping regime on the Korean Peninsula as servants for the aggressors, push the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe and, furthermore, ignite a nuclear war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The puppet ruling forces are the nuclear criminals gravely threatening the destiny of the country and the nation by shipping nuclear weapons of foreign aggressor forces into south Korea and frantically stepping up the moves to ignite a war.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen will never pardon the clique of traitors, which finds fault with fellow countrymen, though it has committed so hideous acts of treachery, and gets frantic with the scheme to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war, but mete out a stern punishment to  it on behalf of the nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kwangju Uprising Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kwangju Uprising Observed
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates a signed article to the 30th anniversary of the heroic Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 The uprising was a patriotic mass resistance to put an end to foreign domination and the military dictators' unpopular and fascist rule and realize the desire for independence, democracy and reunification and a heroic armed uprising unprecedented in the modern history of the East.
					
					 The uprising sustained a setback due to the brutal suppression reminiscent of a battle perpetrated by the military fascist clique at the tacit connivance of the U.S. and under its manipulation but the resistance fighters demonstrated internally and externally the spirit of independence and the mettle not to remain slaves of the colonial fascist dictatorship and dealt a heavy blow at the U.S. imperialists and their stooges military dictatorial forces' colonial fascist rule, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Three decades have passed since the uprising but the desire of the resistance fighters to live in a reunified new country free from outsiders and fascism has not yet come true in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. policy of military occupation and domination over south Korea is a main hurdle lying in the way of realizing independence and democracy in the south Korean society and national reunification. 
					
					 The U.S. ambition for aggression to carry out its strategy for domination over Korea with south Korea as a springboard remains unchanged. The U.S. is now egging the conservative ruling forces of south Korea on to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and revive the fascist dictatorship while blocking the independent and democratic development of the south Korean society and throwing a stumbling block in the way of accomplishing the cause of national reunification. 
					
					 In order to realize the desire of the Kwangju resistance fighters it is necessary to intensify the struggle for independence against the U.S. and for democracy against fascism in south Korea. Herein lies a sure guarantee for putting an end to the U.S. imperialists' colonial domination and achieving the democratic development of society and national reunification, the cherished desire of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Struggle of Workers and Peasants Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle of Workers and Peasants Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations and the Federation of Women Peasants Associations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Monday at which they declared a solidarity struggle of workers and peasants.
					 The organizations clarified that workers and peasants will pool their efforts in the campaign for the victory of the progressive forces in the upcoming "elections to the local self-governing bodies", implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and total revision of the "law on trade union" and in other struggles to win democratic rights.

articles.title: S. Korean People Called on to Defeat upon Dictatorial Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean People Called on to Defeat upon Dictatorial Forces
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on Tuesday on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 Charging that the present regime and the "Grand National Party" are violating democracy following in the footsteps of the proceeding dictators, the statement said that the reality urgently requires the people to turn out in the struggle against dictatorship.
					
					 It called upon all the people to unite by inheriting the spirit displayed by the participants in the Kwangju resistance that took place in May and conduct dynamic actions for judging the present "government". 
					
					 The statement held that it is necessary to declare the second May 18 Kwangju resistance against the dictatorial forces which have trampled down upon the spirit of the Kwangju uprising while urging the participants of the candlelight rallies to "repent".
					
					 It called for putting an end to "the money-manipulated elections" and the "government power-dominated elections" and inflicting a crushing defeat upon the "government" and the GNP in the forthcoming "elections to the local self-governing bodies."

articles.title: Halt to Suppression of Jongyojo Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Suppression of Jongyojo Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Trade Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) held a rally in Seoul on May 16 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of its formation. 
					 The organization recalled that Jongyojo has conducted positive actions as a legitimate organization for the proper education and the social democracy for years. 
					
					 Accusing the present regime of getting frantic in its moves to suppress the organization as evidenced by the massive discharge, prosecution, search and confiscation, opening to the public a list of unionists, scrapping of collective contract, etc. the organization held that such repressive racket is bound to go bust. 
					
					 The organization declared that it would wage a positive struggle to force the authorities to drop its unpopular educational policy benefiting a tiny handful of rich only.
					
					 The organization urged the "government" to stop the suppression of Jongyojo and protect the teachers and students' rights.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Successful Visit to China Hailed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Successful Visit to China Hailed
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Jo Yun Hae, chairman of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, issued a statement on May 17 in congratulation of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's successful unofficial visit to China. 
					 The statement extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Il who made great contribution to the development of the DPRK-China relations, the cause of national reunification and the world peace and security through his visit to China. 
					
					 His recent China visit was an epoch-making event as it strikingly demonstrated the unbreakable DPRK-China friendship that is steadily developing generation after generation, the friendship provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries in the flames of the arduous revolutionary struggle and brought into full bloom as common treasure by them, it noted, adding:
					
					 The DPRK-China relations of good-neighborly friendship and cooperation have grown stronger after several meetings between the top leaders of the two countries in recent years.
					
					 All overseas compatriots will make every possible effort for the national reunification, encouraged by the great successes made by Kim Jong Il through his historic China visit, the statement stressed.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Nuclear Fusion Hailed
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Nuclear Fusion Hailed
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on May 13 as regards the DPRK's successful nuclear fusion. 
					 Noting that scientists of the DPRK succeeded in nuclear fusion reaction on the significant occasion of the Day of the Sun, the statement said that this made an important and dramatic breakthrough in the scientific and technological field, opening a prospect of developing safe and environment-friendly new energy the source of which is abundant.
					
					 The successful nuclear fusion in the DPRK goes to prove that its science and technology have reached the ultra-modern level under the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il, the statement stressed.
					
					 It said that the scientists of the DPRK succeeded in nuclear fusion reaction by their own efforts and with their own technology and resources, thus demonstrating once again the validity of the line of maintaining self-reliance and building an independent national economy.

articles.title: Mexican Organization Issues Bulletin
articles.content:
Mexican Organization Issues Bulletin
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released the 39th issue of its bulletin on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The Idea of 'By Our Nation Itself' and Kim Jong Il" said that Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il regarded it as his iron rule to solve every issue by dint of the concerted efforts of all the people from an independent stand while steering the Korean people for decades. 
					
					 He made the idea of "By our nation itself" a foundation and an essential core for developing the inter-Korean relations, the bulletin noted, adding:
					
					 He provided the inter-Korean summit in June 2000 and saw to it that the joint declaration guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" was adopted. As a result, an unprecedentedly epoch-making turn was effected in the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The historic events that have taken place on the Korean Peninsula for the last decade clearly prove that the idea of "By our nation itself" advanced by Kim Jong Il serves as an immutable banner for Korea's reunification, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Fabrica de Maquinaria Kwanmobong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Fabrica de Maquinaria Kwanmobong
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinaria Kwanmobong donde se introdujo magnificamente la tecnologia CNC.
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano, se entero en detalles del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y produccion recorriendo durante varias horas el exterior y el interior de la fabrica remodelada y modernizada.
					
					Al ver numerosas maquinas herramientas CNC instaladas en hilera en los talleres y los productos que salen en cadena de ellas, evaluo altamente los meritos de los obreros de la fabrica mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos lograran un desarrollo trascendental en la produccion de maquinas al realizar magnificamente la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos productivos.
					
					Como resultado de su intenso movimiento masivo por la innovacion tecnica, los funcionarios, los obreros y los tecnicos de aqui pudieron convertirla conforme a la demanda de la epoca de la economia basada en la intelectualidad, senalo y aprecio altamente el revolucionario modo de trabajo y la emprendedora actitud laboral de ellos quienes avanzan e innovan continuamente sin estancarse ni pararse nunca.
					
					Subrayando que esta fabrica es la ejemplar tanto en la modernizacion como en la cultura de produccion y de vida, volvio a reconocer los esfuerzos de los funcionarios y obreros quienes trabajaron mucho para acondicionar el interior de la fabrica como un palacio y el exterior como un parque.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion y la produccion de la fabrica.
					
					Senalando que la fabrica debe seguir avanzando con pasos firmes hacia la meta cientifica mas alta a base de la exitosa introduccion de la tecnologia CNC, definio el objetivo a ser alcanzado en un futuro cercano y enseno en detalles la orientacion y remedios para ello.
					
					La tarea mas importante de la fabrica es dar buen impulso a la labor para aumentar rapidamente la produccion de nuevos articulos.
					
					Estimulo a los obreros que trabajan abnegadamente por la prosperidad de la patria departiendo cordialmente con ellos en los talleres.
					
					Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica cumpliran magnificamente en el futuro tambien el papel de vanguardia y de brigada en la materializacion de la politica economica del partido.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Hong Sok Hyong, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, y los jefes de departamento del CDN, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige planta Orangchon y centro de genetica de Chongjin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige planta Orangchon y centro de genetica de Chongjin
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el campo de construccion de la Planta Hidroelectrica de Orangchon y el Centro de Genetica de Conejo de Chongjin.
					 El Dirigente estuvo primero en el campo de construccion de la central.
					
					 Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano, visito varios puntos del lugar cerciorandose en detalles del estado de construccion.
					
					 Alabo el creador e innovador modo de trabajo de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos calificando de muy loable el hecho de que ellos acortaron 3 anos el periodo de la obra ahorrando muchos materiales.
					
					 Al igual que la Planta Hidroelectrica No.1 de Orangchon, esta planta no. 2 esta situada en un buen lugar y fue disenada bien observando estrictamente el principio de rentabilidad, apunto y estimulo a los constructores, que edifican otro valioso bien que contribuira a la construccion de una patria prospera, reconociendo sus grandes esfuerzos.
					
					 Si se construyen en el futuro las centrales escalonadas segun el diseno perspectivo de esta planta, es posible obtener mucha electricidad empleando integralmente el caudal del rio Orang y transformar hermosamente el paisaje natural de esta zona, enseno el Dirigente.
					
					 Recorriendo el lugar de construccion del dique Phalhyang de la planta, el Dirigente expreso su gran satisfaccion por la gran velocidad de esta obra y envio su saludo cordial a todos los constructores.
					
					  Luego de presentar las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en terminar con anticipacion la construccion de la planta, resolvio personalmente con gran benevolencia los problemas pendientes.
					
					  Si se toma en cuenta las condiciones geofisicas de nuestro pais en que abundan rios y arroyos, la construccion de la central hidroelectrica es economica y mejor atajo para resolver satisfactoriamente la creciente demanda de electricidad, enfatizo.
					
					  Prosiguio que hace falta seguir materializando cabalmente la politica del PTC consistente en construir en gran medida las plantas hidroelectricas de mediano y pequeno tamanos al paralelo de las de gran dimension.
					
					 Apunto la necesidad de explotar al maximo la capacidad de las centrales ya edificadas y construir al mismo tiempo muchas nuevas buscando y empleando todos los recursos hidraulicos.
					
					A continuacion, el Dirigente realizo su visita de orientacion sobre el Centro de Genetica de Conejo de Chongjin. 
					
					Recorrio varios lugares del centro, incluso las conejeras y la sala de curaciones veterinarias, donde hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de equipos tecnicos y produccion. 
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte haya aumentado bruscamente la produccion de conejitos en ese centro acondicionado magnificamente y suministrara a los habitantes mucha cantidad de carne de pato criando los conejos con los patos.
					
					Hay que fomentar la cria de conejos porque este animal es muy productivo y economico y se cria facilmente en cualquier lugar donde haya hierbas, afirmo y enseno los remedios para realizar esa faena como movimiento masivo. 
					
					Al divisar el marantal en la montana de atras y el herbazal formado en la llanura de enfrente, dijo que si crian los conejos como en este centro, es posible hacer disfrutar al pueblo coreano de una rica vida alimentaria al materializar cabalmente la politica del partido de criar en masas los ganados herbivoros, y exhorto a todas las unidades a seguir el ejemplo del centro. 
					
					Se puede criar cabras, conejos y otros ganados herbivoros en cualquier parte de nuestro pais con muchas montanas, asevero y apunto la necesidad de desplegar con mas dinamismo esta labor como un movimiento masivo para registrar un viraje trascendental en la produccion pecuaria. 
					
					Ese dia, el Dirigente se entero de las gestiones economicas de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte e indico las tareas para realizarlas en la nueva etapa mas alta.
					
					La provincia de Hamgyong del Norte ocupa una posicion importante para el desarrollo economico del pais, dijo el Dirigente y agrego que ella debe jugar el papel de vanguardia en la construccion de la potencia economica. 
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Hong Sok Hyong, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, los jefes de departamento del CDN, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Portavoz del CDN denuncia a banda de traidores titeres de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del CDN denuncia a banda de traidores titeres de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ATCC) -- En relacion con el incidente del hundimiento del buque "Cheonan" de la marina de guerra del ejercito titere surcoreano, el portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 20 la siguiente declaracion:
					 Ya hemos advertido a la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos que no hablara a la bartola en cuanto al incidente del hundimiento del barco "Cheonan" de la marina de guerra del ejercito titere.
					
					 Sin embargo, al cabo de vincular absurdamente ese incidente con nuestro pais sin ninguna prueba material, ella publico al fin y al cabo el resultado de investigacion conjunta, inventado en el sentido de que la causa de hundimiento fuera nuestro ataque de torpedero, enganando asi a la opinion publica nacional e internacional.
					
					  Ademas, en el ambito interno pretende poner en practica el supuesto "castigo merecido" y "venganza" y aplicar hasta la otra "sancion" por conducto de la sociedad internacional.
					
					  El problema esta en que al frente de tal campana anti-RPDC se halla el traidor Lee Myung Bak quien se atrevio a acusar a nuestra Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					  Coordinan los pasos con el los gangsteres del circulo militar titere, inclusive Kim Thae Yong, acostumbrados a aduloneria y sumision a ciegas, y lo azuzan con sus chismes los conservadores ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea como Ryu Myung Hwan.
					
					 Toman parte en dicha campana tambien los agresores norteamericanos y japoneses que se esfuerzan desesperadamente por mantener en su orbita la politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					  Si ellos vinculan obstinadamente con la RPDC el sumergimiento del "Cheonan", entonces, ?por que no lo hacen con otros casos que se reportaron uno tras otro casi simultaneamente, especificamente, la muerte de un soldado del ejercito terrestre titere, la caida de un avion y helicopteros armados de las fuerzas navales y aereas titeres y el hundimiento de una embarcacion civil?
					
					 Ahora estamos en la epoca de ciencias y tecnologias.
					
					 Aunque ellos inventen un embuste verosimil y lo divulguen con mucha exageracion, eso terminara rompiendose como un globo inflado demasiado.
					
					 Lo obvio del caso es que el incidente del "Cheonan" no puede ser calificado sino de "complot" e "invento" que urdio la camarilla de traidores con la logica de bandido persiguiendo cierto objetivo politico y militar, para el cual no ofrendo ni una sola vida de oficial sino sacrifico 46 soldados muertos tragicamente.
					
					 A pesar de esto, al igual que el ladron que se arroga la condicion de victima, ellos dirigen atrevidamente su sucio indice acusador a la RPDC.
					
					 Desde el principio, ha sido un metodo rutinario de los titeres surcoreanos de sucesivos regimenes inventar incidentes drasticos cada vez que caen en la crisis y levantar con ellos en la opinion publica la "oleada de criticas al Norte". 
					
					En estos dias, incorporan en ese complot hasta a los "fugitivos del Norte" y otras escorias humanas que huyeron al basurero. 
					
					Frente a la grave situacion en que el malsano complot de la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos puede dar lugar a la aventurera accion contra nuestro pais, el CDN de la RPDC, que se responsabiliza por la defensa del pais y la seguridad nacional, declara al interior y al exterior la siguiente posicion de principios de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					1.   Ya que la banda de traidores declaro que en el hundimiento del barco "Cheonan" esta involucrado nuestro pais, enviaremos al lugar de hechos en el Sur de Corea el grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC para verificar la prueba material del respecto.
					
					La camarilla de traidores debe presentar ante nuestro prestigiado grupo de inspeccion la prueba material que confirmara que el hundimiento del barco tiene que ver con nuestro pais.
					
					Le llamamos la atencion por adelantado que esa prueba material no debe tener ni la mas minima sospecha.
					
					2.   Nuestro ejercito y pueblo responderan inmediatamente con varias contramedidas duras incluyendo la guerra total, a cualquier "castigo merecido" y la "venganza" de la banda de traidores y a la supuesta "sancion" que viole nuestros intereses estatales.
					
					Nuestra guerra total sera la sagrada de toda la nacion, todo el pueblo y todo el Estado para destruir por completo el bastion de la banda de traidores, autora del mencionado "complot" e "invento", y sus satelites y edificar ahi una gran potencia reunificada donde estara en prosperidad toda la nacion coreana.
					
					Nuestras contramedidas duras se concretaran en las justas acciones practicas que daran un castigo imprevisible a la banda de traidores que estropea la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y fomenta el ambiente de enfrentamiento en la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					3. Puesto que la banda de traidores hablo publicamente de la supuesta "accion resuelta", consideraremos como provocacion de los maniacos de confrontacion cualquier incidente pequeno que acontezca en el mar, el cielo y el territorio bajo nuestra jurisdiccion, inclusive el Mar Oeste de Corea, y responderemos con un potente golpe fisico de represalia que no tendra limites ni piedad.
					
					Responder con la represalia mas intensiva a la "represalia" y con implacable castigo a nuestro estilo al "castigo merecido", esto es nuestra voluntad invariable y tan firme como acero.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, advertimos severamente a las autoridades de EE.UU. y Japon y otros fulanos y menganos, quienes se portan irracionalmente adhiriendose a las primeras, que actuen con prudencia.
					
					El mundo vera claramente cuan caro pagara la banda de traidores su torpe "complot" e "invento" fabricados para aplastar a los connacionales.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica locura de banda de conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica locura de banda de conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, en la conferencia de examen de ejecucion de TNP, que se efectua en Estados Unidos, la banda de conservadores del Sur de Corea desacredito sin fundamento a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando del supuesto "desafio frontal a la no proliferacion" y pidio el "fortalecimiento de sancion" internacional contra la RPDC.
					 Ademas, en la 25a "reunion de iniciativa de la politica de seguridad" Sur de Corea-EE.UU., solicito a su amo gringo la "cooperacion militar" contra la RPDC hablando de la "provocacion" y "amenaza" de alguien.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este jueves y continua:
					
					 Tal mendicacion de la camarilla titere surcoreana deviene un crimen antinacional para danar a los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas bajo el pretexto de "no proliferacion". 
					
					 El hecho muestra la ambicion sucia de la banda de traidores de impedir el proceso de establecimiento del sistema de paz en la Peninsula Coreana, llevar a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas y provocar de todas maneras la guerra nuclear contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sirviendo de lacayo a los agresores. 
					
					 Las fuerzas gobernantes titeres del Sur de Corea,  que introdujeron en el suelo surcoreano las armas nucleares de las fuerzas extranjeras agresoras y se aferran con frenesi a las maniobras belicas, son precisamente los criminales nucleares que amenazan gravemente el destino del pais y la nacion. 
					
					 Toda la nacion coreana no perdonara ni en lo minimo y castigara severamente a nombre de la nacion a los traidores que acarrean el nubarron de la guerra nuclear cometiendo tales crimenes antinacionales y acusando a los connacionales.
